content: संभारः {@--1@} Bringing together, collecting. {@--2@} Preparation, provisions, necessaries, requisites, apparatus, things requisite for any act; सविशेषमद्य पूजासंभारो मया संनिधापनीयः <ls>Māl. 5</ls>; <ls>R. 12. 4</ls>; <ls>V. 2.</ls> {@--3@} An ingredient, a constituent part. {@--4@} Multitude, heap, quantity, assemblage; as in शस्त्रास्त्रसंभार. {@--5@} Fulness. {@--6@} Wealth, affluence. {@--7@} Maintenance, support.
